pages.text: The $(item)Medicine Bag$() allows you to carry a $(l:basics/totem_effects)Totem Effect$() with you, so you can use its benefits for a limited time even when you are not near a Totem Pole.$(br2)Once you have crafted your Medicine Bag, Sneak+Right click it on a Totem Pole block carved with the effect you want to have. You can then right click the bag to open or close it.

pages.title: Medicine Bag
pages.text: $(br)The Medicine Bag will last for a few minutes before it depletes. To $(emph)charge$() it, just stand near a Totem Pole that has your bag's effect carved into it.
